foodList.name: Iron Rations
foodList.description: A medley of cured meats, dried fruits, nuts, cheese, and crackers. Packed with protein, this simple meal will be sure to keep you feeling nice and hearty during your journey.

foodList.name: Spicy Chicken Stirfry
foodList.description: A spicy stirfry made with chicken, vegetables, and a variety of spices. Our local spices are sure to put some pep in your step and keep you on your toes.

foodList.name: Lucky Rabbit Stew
foodList.description: A slow cooked stew made with special rabbits bred for decades specifically for their lucky properties. Paired with a side of sourdough bread, those who eat this leave the guild with a feeling they can do just about anything.
effects: You have the strangest feeling that just about everything is going to go your way this adventure...
